nav.div: Hayward Community School District » Parents » Food Service » COVID-19 Food Service Updates

span.span:
The Hayward Community School District will be providing free breakfast and lunch to all students to households whom have students attending the Hayward Community School District that are 18 years of age and younger. We feel food service is a very important element of our process during this epidemic. This program will start on Thursday, March 19th and will continue through April 23rd (Monday-Friday). Options to participate in our food service program include either picking up your food from the Hayward High School drive thru location or daily bus delivery to your bus stop. Times for both drive thru pick-up and bus delivery will be between the hours of 11:00 a.m-1:00 p.m.
We ask that you complete this survey so we can provide this opportunity for students to receive meals.

span.strong: If you wish to change from your original selection we are offering a

strong.span: change option due by Tuesday Noon March 24th. Changed location will be effective Wednesday, March 25th.

strong.br: If you do not have internet access and would like to participate in our off-school food service program, please call the building level assistants and they will get your information logged into our system.
